Package com.iceybones.scheduler.controllers

Class MainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iceybones.scheduler.controllers.MainController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Logic controller pertaining to the main scene.

      • stopNotifyService

        static void stopNotifyService()

      • stopDbService

        static void stopDbService()
        Shuts down the database service.

      • cancelNotify

        static void cancelNotify()
        Forces the notification service to shutdown now and spawn a new thread to be used in it's place. This stops the notification bar from finishing it's cycle and closing at an inopportune time, namely when a second notification has been issued.

      • notify

        public void notify​(java.lang.String message,
                   MainController.NotificationType type,
                   java.lang.Boolean undoable)
        Open the notification bar, display a message for five seconds and then close.
        Parameters:
        message - the message that will be displayed to the user
        type - the notification type that determines which icon will be displayed
        undoable - sets whether or not the undo hyperlink will be displayed

      • disableUndo

        void disableUndo()
        Disable the undo hyperlink.

      • getDbService

        static java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService getDbService()
        Returns:
        the service that has the sole responsibility of communicating with the database via static methods in the Database class.

      • onActionUndoLink

        private void onActionUndoLink()
        Rollback the database when the undo hyperlink is clicked. Two lambda expressions are used to implement the Runnable functional interface and help with thread management.
